about.title: About me
about.primary: 24 years old, passionate about technology, I'm a student at 42 and I like to learn new things and share my knowledge with others
about.secondary: Always looking for new challenges, I am a person who likes to work in a team and I am always ready to help others

projects.title: Minishell
projects.description: The objective of this project is for you to create a simple shell. Learnt a lot about file descriptors, process and bash. Coded in C.

projects.title: Cub3D
projects.description: Interesting project where I learnt how raycasting works and how to render a 3D environment with a 2D map. Coded in C with the minilibx library.

projects.title: Project 3
projects.description: If the project was collaborative, reflect it in this description, that will demonstrate communication and/or leadership skills. Additionally, if you made use of the mastery of a second language, it will reflect on you professionalism.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
